title: List of all Androidaudio recorder   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidaudio recorder   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: AndroidAudioRecorder
repoList.description: A fancy audio recorder lib for Android. Supports WAV format at 48kHz.

repoList.name: Android-Wave-Recorder
repoList.description: A powerful and efficient library to record WAVE form audio files (WAV) in Android

repoList.name: ARL
repoList.description: Audio Recorder Library for Android

repoList.name: audio-recorder
repoList.description: Android library for audio recorder

repoList.name: OboeAudioRecorder
repoList.description: This is a sample project that uses Google Oboe Library for recording the MIC input of an Android device and write the recorded data to a .WAV file.

repoList.name: AudioHusbandWife
repoList.description: Audio Player and Recorder Library For Android

repoList.name: AudioRecorder
repoList.description: An Android Library that takes care of recording Audio Files in Android and Creating different files for them as well

repoList.name: SpectraAudioRecorderAndroid
repoList.description: Android Library for high definition audio recording.

repoList.description: A Audio Recorder Library for Android

repoList.name: Android-Audio
repoList.description: An android library that creates a FAB audio recorder button
